content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone_slab", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 8, "index": 37}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 42, "index": 44}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft polished_blackstone, I need to place 2 blackstone side by side in the crafting grid. I will move the first blackstone from slot 27 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone_slab", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 8, "index": 37}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 42, "index": 44}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I will move the second blackstone from slot 27 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sandstone_slab", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 8, "index": 37}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 42, "index": 44}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft the second polished_blackstone, I need to place 2 blackstone side by side in the crafting grid. I will move the first blackstone from slot 27 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "sandstone_slab", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 8, "index": 37}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 42, "index": 44}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

Ok

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "sandstone_slab", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 8, "index": 37}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 42, "index": 44}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the polished_blackstone by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
